title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD New Baselines Report, Tue Jun 25 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Tue Jun 18 2024 10:25:45 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Jun 25 2024 20:30:19 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

48 new Baseline implementations

api

  1. SharedWorker ➞ SharedWorker ➞ options_type_parameter  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. WorkerGlobalScope ➞ rejectionhandled_event  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  3. WorkerGlobalScope ➞ unhandledrejection_event  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari

css

  1. types ➞ global_keywords ➞ revert-layer  ➞  Added to Chrome, Safari

html

  1. global_attributes ➞ title ➞ multi-line_titles  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari

http

  1. headers ➞ Access-Control-Allow-Headers ➞ wildcard  ➞  Added to Safari
  2. headers ➞ Access-Control-Allow-Methods ➞ wildcard  ➞  Added to Safari

mathml

  1. elements ➞ annotation  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. elements ➞ annotation-xml  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  3. elements ➞ mprescripts  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
